summary: Executive Manager with strong team, stakeholder and people management experience, with 15+ years in Azure solution design and development. Proven track record leading complex technology services, building (Hiring, Coaching, Managing) high-performing teams, and delivering enterprise-grade cloud for global clients.

Cloud & Stack: Azure (Functions, Web Apps, ADF, Key Vault)
ASP.NET MVC, ReactJS, C#, Graph API

experience_details.skills: Azure, Team Management, Stakeholder Management, Operations
highlights: Managing 17 direct reports with an overall span of 56 members.
Grown the team by 120% over 2 years and added 4 new service offerings.
Managing team in a Role-Based Organization with no additional head count and handling Contingency Work Force.
Led upskilling initiatives for 200+ people, resulting in 110+ certifications.
Full stack developer for 'Nucleus': Built automated SQL permission provisioning using Azure Entra groups.
Managing a team of 20 and designing scalable STR compliance solutions on Azure.
Unified Search: Worked with Graph API, Cognitive Services, and ADF to digitize subsurface data.
Search CoE: Optimized LOB data ingestion and relevance for Shell's global workforce.
Special Handling: Developed Web API for S2S communication between Deloitte Tax LOB and SharePoint 2013.
